title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.32 - Vendors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.32 - Vendors

State Regulations

No person in any park, including any park street and all
public sidewalks of such abutting streets, shall sell, offer for sale, hire, lease or let anything whatsoever, tangible, intangible or any service or engage
in any other commercial activity, including commercial, still, video, cinema or
audio reproduction of events or activities occurring in the parks except under
and within the terms of a permit, or except as otherwise provided by
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.32

Renumbered
from 9003.26

New

York State Register July 8, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 27, eff. 7/8/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
